import React, { Component } from "react"; import { MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBCard, MDBCardBody, MDBMask, MDBView, MDBBtn, } from "mdbreact"; import { Splide, SplideSlide } from "@splidejs/react-splide"; import "@splidejs/splide/dist/css/themes/splide-skyblue.min.css"; class ProductView extends Component { state = {}; render() { return (

{this.props.name}

{this.props.description}

{this.props.company}

{this.props.companyDescription}

תיאור

{this.props.productDescription}

מאפיינים

{this.props.ish} THC : {this.props.thc} CBD : {this.props.cbd}

); } } export default ProductView;
